data.title: Vinyl Pussycat Records
data.text:
Description

Island Records,Island Records,Island Records,Sonet ILPS 9722, ILPS 9722*, ILPS-9722 LP, Album Sweden 1982

A1. My Jamaican Guy 6:00

A2. Nipple To The Bottle 5:55

A3. The Apple Stretching 6:45

B1. Everybody Hold Still 3:10

B2. Cry Now, Laugh Later 5:00

B3. Inspiration 4:35

B4. Unlimited Capacity For Love 5:45

Credits:

Photography By [Sleeve] – Jean-Paul Goude

Photography By [Other Photographs] – Trevor Rogers (2)

Percussion – Uziah “Sticky” Thompson

Mixed By – Steven Stanley

Mixed By – Michael H. Brauer

Mixed By – Alex Sadkin

Mastered By [Runouts] – Peter Strindberg

Mastered By [Innersleeve] – Ted Jensen

Keyboards – Wally Badarou

Guitar – Mikey Chung

Guitar – Barry Reynolds

Engineer [Recording] – Steven Stanley

Engineer [Recording] – Alex Sadkin

Engineer [Assistant] – Benjamin Armbrister

Drums, Electronic Drums [Syndrums] – Sly Dunbar

Design – Rob O’Connor

Design – Jean-Paul Goude

Bass Guitar – Robbie Shakespeare

Producer – Alex Sadkin

Producer – Chris Blackwell

Written-By – Barry Reynolds

Written-By – Grace Jones

Written-By – Melvin Van Peebles

Written-By – Sly Dunbar

Media Condition: Mint (M)

Sleeve Condition: Mint (M)

Swedish pressing with Sonet logos on the labels.

Issued with a printed innersleeve and a mail-order leaflet in Swedish for the “A One Man Show” video tape.

℗ Island Records Inc. © Island Records Inc.

Recorded at Compass Point Studios, Nassau Bahamas.

Mastered […] at Sterling Sound, New York.

“The Apple Stretching” is from the Broadway musical “Waltz of the Stork”.

© 1982 All lyrics used by permission

℗ 1982 Original sound recording made by Island Records Inc.
